backend/main.mo: Motoko actor storing lead forms in a map with submit and query functions.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report linking the phone-number update feature to affected files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file containing prewritten summaries for all frontend source files.
frontend/DEPLOYED_MAINNET.md: Template for recording mainnet deployment details including URLs and canister IDs.
frontend/DEPLOYMENT.md: Deployment guide explaining domain rules and how to deploy to IC mainnet using free hosting.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS setup defining color tokens and light/dark theme variables.
frontend/index.html: Frontend HTML entry point with metadata, fonts, and root mount element.
frontend/project-domain.json: JSON file defining the required project domain techmarket-digital.
frontend/scripts/deploy-mainnet.sh: Shell script validating domain and deploying frontend/back-end canisters to IC mainnet.
frontend/scripts/post-deploy-smoke-check: Checklist for verifying core features and behavior after mainnet deployment.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component applying theme provider and rendering HomePage and Toaster.
frontend/src/components/landing/Footer.t: Footer component showing brand text, navigation buttons, and social links using siteConfig.
frontend/src/components/landing/Header.t: Responsive header with brand display, navigation links, CTA buttons, and a toggleable mobile menu.
frontend/src/components/landing/LeadForm: Lead capture form with validation, submit handling, success state, and integration with useLeadForm hook.
frontend/src/components/landing/Motion.t: Wrapper component that reveals children with a visibility animation using IntersectionObserver and optional delay.
frontend/src/components/landing/ProcessS: Displays a four-step animated process grid using MotionDiv and icon cards.
frontend/src/components/landing/Sections: Defines major landing page sections such as hero, trust, services, process, and contact using copy and animations.
frontend/src/components/landing/Services: Renders an animated grid of service cards with icons and descriptions.
frontend/src/components/landing/StickyCo: Fixed-position WhatsApp and call buttons for quick user contact, with mobile-specific adjustments.
frontend/src/config/contact.ts: Centralized contact config providing numbers, labels, and computed WhatsApp and phone URLs.
frontend/src/config/siteConfig.ts: Global site configuration including branding, SEO, CTA labels, social links, and form copy.
frontend/src/content/homeCopy.ts: Text content for homepage sections, sourcing CTA labels from siteConfig.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook that creates and manages a backend actor based on authentication, refreshing dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and provider for managing Internet Identity authentication using AuthClient, handling login state, stored identities, and status flags.
frontend/src/hooks/useLeadForm.ts: Implements form state, validation, and submission logic for sending lead data to a backend actor, including success/error handling.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind CSS base styles, custom OKLCH color variables, dark mode themes, typography, and motion utility classes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with React Query and the Internet Identity provider before rendering.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Assembles the landing page layout by composing various section components, header, footer, and sticky contact buttons.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind CSS with custom colors, animations, container settings, extended theme options, and plugins.
frontend/WEBSITE_EDITING_GUIDE.md: Guide showing which config files control editable website content and branding.
project_state.json: Tracks project metadata, known issues, and feature requests related to updating and centralizing the site's phone number.
